General.Name: FN Factory Outlet Public Company Limited
General.Description: FN Factory Outlet Public Company Limited engages in the merchandising of clothing and consumer products in Thailand. The company retails apparel and non-apparel goods through factory outlets. It offers bedding, household items, kitchenware, home decoration, and furniture products under the Prim and Cushy brands; health bedding and pillow, and health products for elders under the Cherish brand; suitcases under the Rollica brand; diaper, breast milk storage bags, hand cleaning spray, and children's product under the KUMO brand; and adult and elders products under TOBU brand. The company also provides sunglasses, leather shoes, men's wear, and accessories under the INCO brand; work and shoulder bags, and women's wear and accessories under the Cheval brand; women's ornaments, sunglasses, and shoes under the ETC brand; tissue paper under the SABUY brand; and bedding products under the CHAABA brand. In addition, it offers, men's apparel under the Monsieur INCO brand; women's apparel, lingerie, ornaments, and accessories under the INCO Women, Lady de Cheval, and ETC brands; cloths, underwear, and socks for boys and girls under the Cheval Kids brand; pajamas for men, women, and children under the SLEEP MATE brand; underwear and socks for men, women, and children under the Nipon brand. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
